response.overview: The story of a family living in a block of flats. Each family member has degeneration of one of the body parts: a big foot, too long an arm, huge ears. The main character, a teenager called Giraffe because of his long neck, feels lonely and misunderstood by his loved ones who have learned to live with his defects. While celebrating Giraffe's birthday, an accident occurs that opens up new opportunities for him.
response.title: Pasteloza

release_dates.note: 42. Koszaliński Festiwal Debiutów Filmowych „Młodzi i Film”
